home.title: Online Puzzle Games
home.description: Enjoy classic geometric puzzles like Tangram and Polyomino online. Challenge your mind and spark creativity in a modern puzzle experience.
home.keywords: puzzle, online game, tangram, polyomino, geometric puzzle, brain game, educational puzzle

list.title: Tangram

list.keywords: Tangram Puzzle Collection, Educational Puzzle, Learning Game, Creativity Puzzle, Online Shape Play

create.title: Tangram - create

contact.title: Contact Us | We’ll Get Back to You Quickly
